recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs
insructions: Crack eggs into a bowl
Add salt and pepper and whisk
Heat a pan on medium heat and add the butter.
Add eggs and stir frequently to avoid burning
Remove from stove when eggs are cooked through
Serve with some toast!

recipes.name: Fruit Bowl
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy bowl of fruit.
ingredients: 2 cups of your favorite fruits & berries
insructions: Dice up your fruits (leave berries whole)
Add heavy cream and syrup to a bowl and whisk with a hand beater or electric mixer until stiff peaks form
Add fruit to a bowl
Add whip to the fruit and enjoy!

recipes.name: Turkey Sandwich
recipes.description: A classic cold cut turkey sandwich
insructions: Spread the mayo on the bread
Layer the rest of the ingredients on one piece of the bread
Put the other piece of bread on top
Serve with chips and a drink

recipes.name: Leftovers
insructions: Open up the fridge
Search around for something to eat
Reheat food if necessary...
... Or just eat it cold.

recipes.name: Steak and Potatoes
ingredients: 1 steak, a Ribeye or NY Strip is preffered
insructions: Preheat oven to 400. Poke holes in potato with a fork and wrap it in foil, then place it in the oven
After potato has been in the oven for about 40 minutes, Heat a pan on medium high heat
Salt both sides of the steak generously, as well as adding a little pepper
Add some oil to the pan. When oil shimmers, add steak and let cook for 5 minutes. After that, flip and cook another 5 minutes
At this point, the steak should be medium rare. Cook an additional minute and 30 seconds for medium, 3 minutes for medium well, or 5 minutes for well done.
Remove steak from pan and let rest on cutting board
Remove potato from the oven and unwrap. Cut it open and put butter and sour cream on it
Serve the steak and the potato.
